briefdescription.para: Solve Ax = b using HYPRE's generic IJ matrix format where A is a sparse matrix specified using the compressed sparse row (CSR) format.

detaileddescription.para: An example of using HypreSolver to solve Poisson's equation is located in Tests/LinearSolvers/Hypre
